FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: Answers to common questions about using Lanka.

Q1.QUESTION: How do I connect my Instagram account?
Q1.ANSWER: Go to Link Instagram from the sidebar and follow the secure authorization flow. We never store your Instagram password.

Q2.QUESTION: Can I edit my profile later?
Q2.ANSWER: Yes. Visit Settings > Profile to update your bio, photo, and pricing details at any time.

Q1.QUESTION: How do I create an offer?
Q1.ANSWER: Open My Pact and click Create Offer. Define the package, price, and deliverables you’re comfortable providing.

Q2.QUESTION: What happens when a brand proposes a campaign?
Q2.ANSWER: You’ll see it in Campaigns. Review details, then accept or reject. Once confirmed, you can mark deliverables as done and request completion.

Q1.QUESTION: Can I negotiate pricing?
Q1.ANSWER: Yes. Brands can propose custom pricing when creating a campaign. You decide whether to accept or suggest revisions.

Q2.QUESTION: How do I set my price range?
Q2.ANSWER: Your offers control your price range. Update offer prices in My Pact to reflect your current rates.

Q1.QUESTION: How do I report an issue?
Q1.ANSWER: Email support@lanka.app with campaign or offer IDs and a short description. We respond within one business day.

Q2.QUESTION: Who can see my offers?
Q2.ANSWER: Your offers are visible to brands you collaborate with. Public visibility depends on the collaboration context and your account settings.
